name: Walking On Sunshine | Korean Hair Salon & Cafe

reviews.text: Hair stylist Creme was very professional and detailed with her work. Had a consultation before she decide a haircut for my face shape and head shape. She explains everything clearly. Really enjoyed throughout my haircut. Even the hair wash was excellent, not sure who was it but he was very patient and did my hair wash very well. Overall very relaxing and smooth service from Walking on sunshine. Definitely will come back again :)

Booked You Jung for root touch up, was very pleased with the result. You Jung and assistant(did not manage to catch her name) did meticulous service even with the hair wash and blow dry afterwards. Highly recommended. The customer service was great as well, for the you are my sunshine side.

A comfortable and positive hair experience with Hair stylist Anita. I did the 3-step hair bundle with her and she recommends me to do the hair Keratin treatment. I am pleased with the results because I have silky hair now. Stylist Edgar also helped me with the hair wash and head massage, thank you both ! I highly recommend you this salon.  ☺️

Did the colour bundle of Haircut, colour, 3 step treatment with Ivy today. I really liked my haircut and colour! Ivy ask for my preference, my lifestyle and recommend me the length to cut and style. She is very friendly too and will give me advices on how to maintain my hair colour at home. Also amazing hair wash & hair treatment! I love this salon because of the atmosphere, very garden vibes! Overall 10/10 experience here!

Had my Rebond plus Cinderella Treatment for my upcoming wedding. Love the result. Vinx did a pretty good job for thinning my thick hair. The layers are gorgeous! No pushy services and products. Likey the complimentary snacks.See you soon for touch ups! Thank you for the loads of vouchers.
